name: Coin Pusher World
description:
THIS IS A TWITCH INTERACTIVE CHAT GAME



Coin Pusher World is a crowd-play game designed around a old arcade coin pousher machine experience.

Coin Pusher World Is A fully Twitch Interactive gameplay for any streamer to play with their followers,

The thrill of coin dropping is in the palm of your hand. Enjoy the ultimate coin pusher machine experience found at amusement arcades, carnivals and circus! When a coin is dropped in, it falls onto the platform. Try to drop the coins carefully so that they can push the other medals and prizes off of the edge.

Timing in dropping the coin is the key in Coin Pusher World

Please esure you fully understand that this game is played via your chat on Twitch and is not a single player game that you play on your own without connecting to twitch.

Please visit our website to see commands for the game and also for your leaderboard overlay.

Coin Pusher World Is Not Avaliable On Mac Systems

Good Luck And Happy Dropping.
